Body:
p = StepClonerForEachDataInput(SomeStep())
p.set_hyperparams_space(HyperparameterSpace({META_STEP_HP:
    RAND_INT_META_STEP, SOME_STEP_HP: RAND_INT_SOME_STEP}))
updated_some_step_hp_space = RandInt(0, 400)
p.update_hyperparams_space({SOME_STEP_HP: updated_some_step_hp_space})
assert isinstance(p.hyperparams, HyperparameterSamples)
assert p.hyperparams_space[META_STEP_HP] == RAND_INT_META_STEP
assert p.wrapped.get_hyperparams_space()[SOME_STEP_HP_KEY
    ] == updated_some_step_hp_space
